title: Captivated
description: Needed: one fake boyfriend for the holidaysThis holiday season, Macy must make a choice. Marry a man she detests to save her family's company or fake date the man she secretly wants in order to escape her fate.Garrett has wanted Macy since college, but he made a promise that he wouldn't touch his best friend's little sister. But now that she is being pushed to marry another man, Garrett knows this is his last chance.Now he has to convince Macy he is the one for her. As long as her brother doesn't kill him first.
author: Danielle Pays
